com.justai.zenbox.sdk

Enum State

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<State>
      • com.justai.zenbox.sdk.State
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<State>

    public enum State
extends java.lang.Enum<State>
    The State enum contains possible values of ZenboxService states. You can use this enum to react on the state changes in your application through a ZenboxListener.onStateChanged(State). And obtain the current state through a ZenboxService.getState().

    • Enum Constant Summary

      Enum Constants 
      Enum Constant and Description
      INITIALIZING
      ZenboxService is not ready to work yet.
      LISTENING
      This status signals that SpeechToText service is listening the user's speech now.
      PROCESSING
      This status is the leading status of LISTENING.
      SPEAKING
      This status signals that ZenboxService synthesises the speech from ResponseData.SuccessResponse.
      STANDBY
      This status is the base status of ZenboxServive and means that ZenboxService is ready to process the next user's request.

    • Enum Constant Detail

      • INITIALIZING

        public static final State INITIALIZING
        ZenboxService is not ready to work yet.

      • STANDBY

        public static final State STANDBY
        This status is the base status of ZenboxServive and means that ZenboxService is ready to process the next user's request. In this status the SpeechToText and TextToSpeech services are in the standby mode. As usual this status also means that VoiceTrigger is active and listens the user's speech.

      • LISTENING

        public static final State LISTENING
        This status signals that SpeechToText service is listening the user's speech now. The TextToSpeech and VoiceTrigger services are in standby mode.

      • PROCESSING

        public static final State PROCESSING
        This status is the leading status of LISTENING. ZenboxService has received the SpeechToText recognition results and sends it to the Zenbox server. The VoiceTrigger service is in active mode in this moment. ZenboxService is ready now to process the next user's request immediately.

      • SPEAKING

        public static final State SPEAKING
        This status signals that ZenboxService synthesises the speech from ResponseData.SuccessResponse. The VoiceTrigger service is in active mode in this moment.

    • Method Detail

      • values

        Returns an array containing the constants of this enum type, in the order they are declared. This method may be used to iterate over the constants as follows: 
        for (State c : State.values())
    System.out.println(c);
